title: Kullhad Economy Festival 2025 begins at IIT Mandi: Anurag Thakur urges tech for villages; cites India’s digital rise
description:
Anurag Thakur at the event

Lok Sabha MP and former union minister Anurag Thakur addressed students at the Kullhad Economy Fest (KEF) hosted by IIT Mandi on Friday, where he emphasised the role of youth in driving India’s startup ecosystem, digital transformation, and local economic development thro...
